import sys

N = int(input())

# get the number of 500-yen coins
num_of_coins = N // 500

# get the amount of change
change = 500 * num_of_coins - N

print(change)

a = int(input())
if a == 1:
    print(1)
else:
    print(0)
import sys

N = int(input())

# get the number of 1000-yen bills
num_of_bills = N // 1000

# get the amount of change
change = 1000 * num_of_bills - N

print(change)

N = int(input())
change = 1000 - N % 1000
print(change)


N = int(input())
change = 1000 - N % 1000
print(change if change != 1000 else 0)

N = int(input())

num_of_bills = N // 1000
change = 1000 * num_of_bills - N

print(change)


N = int(input())

change = 1000 - (N % 1000) if N % 1000 != 0 else 0

print(change)


while True:
    N = int(input())

    if N < 1000:
        change = 1000 - (N % 1000)
        print(change)

    else:
        print(0)
